instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Use the 'Barlow Condensed' font for ALL headings (h1-h3). This is the core of the brand identity.
CRITICAL: The primary color is GOLD (#EAB308). Use it for primary actions (buttons) and key highlights. Do not overuse it.
CRITICAL: The background must be deep midnight blue (#0B1120), NOT pure black.
Use 'Manrope' for all body text to ensure high readability.
Implement a 'Bento' grid layout for the dashboard/discovery page.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Do not use generic placeholders.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state that increases brightness or adds a subtle glow.
For the 'Travel Schedule', use a timeline or list view with clear dates and location icons.
Profile cards should emphasize the photo first, with profession/type clearly visible as a badge.
Maintain a 'masculine' aesthetic: sharp corners (rounded-sm or rounded-md max), high contrast, bold typography.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays and navbars.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
